motivation.title: Why Regular Exercise Matters?

point2.text: - 10 minutes daily, dramatic results in 3 months

motivation.premiumNote: With Premium: Unlock all {{count}} exercises, track progress with charts

tip.title: Tip:
tip.text: It's recommended to do exercises twice daily, morning and evening. Each session takes only 5-10 minutes.
